title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: Color orange doesn't work.
OB: When trying to apply the color orange, the preview does not show the expected result.
EB: When applying the color orange, the preview should show the expected result.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the color selection tool. 2. Choose the color orange. 3. Observe the preview.
